subSections.title: Han character
Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
The character's shape was historically very similar to {{zh-l|*王}}; a dot was introduced to differentiate the two.

{{liushu|p}}: a picture of a [[w:Cong_(jade)|cong]] ({{zh-l|*琮}}), a sort of ritual jade totem.

It is also interpreted as three pieces of jade strung together on a string.
